content: The Skandha of Consciousness can be found in Mount Huago in Chapter 6. Upon accessing the Cloud ability in this chapter, you can head towards a massive enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang. To activate the Giant Shigandang, you will need the other four Skandha items scattered throughout the game: Skandha of Form, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice, and Skandha of Feeling.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Consciousness.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Consciousness'.
The content is as follows:
The Skandha of Consciousness can be found in Mount Huago in Chapter 6. Upon accessing the Cloud ability in this chapter, you can head towards a massive enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang. To activate the Giant Shigandang, you will need the other four Skandha items scattered throughout the game: Skandha of Form, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice, and Skandha of Feeling.
